item.title: Pickford close, 6th January
item.description:
The council bin outside the fish and chip shop has been knocked over by a car. Looks damaged. Also why stress you allowing cars to be parked on the forecourt beside the fish and chip shop! 3 cars parked there yesterday? Bexley council own this land.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Residents moved out left their crap!, 6th January
item.description:

item.title: Graffiti, 6th January
item.description:

item.title: Hazardous Pavement, 6th January
item.description:
There is a raised curb on the pavement where a dropped curb should be, outside the motorcycle MOT. This is extremely dangerous - I tripped while pushing a pram yesterday. There are also many children scooting, cycling, and playing in the area, so tripping here is a serious hazard. I've reported this issue multiple times to the council, but for some reason, it still hasn't been addressed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Craven Park Road, West Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
